Description of incident: Names, dates of birth and Social            Security numbers of roughly 28,000 state retirees were e-mailed to the            Kentucky Retirement Systems without being properly encrypted for security            purposes by its pharmacy benefit provider. The e-mail contained dates            of birth, Social Security numbers and health insurance claim numbers            but not personal health information. The file contained information            only on members who were both Medicare-eligible and used the retiree            pharmacy benefit through Walgreens in 2007.
